inlineImageAndParagraph.text: Phonetic Name Matching provides advanced capabilities to compare and verify names, even when they contain variations like typos, misspellings, regional differences, abbreviations, or nicknames. It's a crucial tool for robust identity verification, fraud prevention, and maintaining high data quality across financial institutions, e-commerce, and HR.

items.description: Utilises sophisticated phonetic algorithms like Soundex and Metaphone to match names based on their sound, not just exact character sequences, ensuring high accuracy.
Generates a precise numerical score (0-100) indicating the degree of phonetic similarity between two input names, enabling flexible thresholding for verification.
Effectively identifies matches despite common data entry errors, cultural name variations, shortened forms, and nicknames, reducing false negatives in identity checks.
